examples: the ratio of working men to unemployed

results.definition: a mine or quarry that is being or has been worked
(of e.g. a machine) performing or capable of performing
adequate for practical use; especially sufficient in strength or numbers to accomplish something
examples: the party has a working majority in the House

results.definition: adopted as a temporary basis for further work
serving to permit or facilitate further work or activity
examples: discussed the working draft of a peace treaty
they need working agreements with their neighbor states on interstate projects
